reviewsJson.markdown:
**RDA**/ Velocity 

**% Used**/ 6 

**Coil**/ Clapton **W**/ 45

 **Steep Time**/2 weeks **Wicking**/ Full 

**PG/VG** 50/50 **Nic%** 0

**Mouth Feel** - heavy on the palate and light on the nose, with the rich smooth  inhale and airy exhale. Moderately dense would give it 5 out of 10, with no throat hit.          

**Flavor Properties**- Smooth rich cream with a moderate butter flavor, and light egg flavor. Light vanilla, and a very heavy Dairy Flavour, and very sweet.

**Relatable Flavors** - Like eating the filling out of a cream filled donut.

**Off Flavors**- Slight lingering vanilla aftertaste

**Position In The Recipe** - Like most cream flavors this is going to work well in the base . Can also be used as an accent to boost other creams.                              

**Pairings** - This flavoring is super versatile the list is almost endless but here's a few.Other creams, chocolates, fruits, tobacco's, bakeries, and nut flavorings.
reviewsJson.author: Chrisdvr1
reviewsJson.title: Bavarian Cream
